mapper.select:
SELECT B_P_001.ID BID, B_P_001.DGBH, B_P_001.DGMC, B_P_006.ZT, B_P_006.LB, B_P_003.ID KCID, B_P_003.KCBH, B_P_003.KCMC, B_P_003.IS_FX, B_P_003.ZQZ, B_P_003.ZQDW, COALESCE(B_P_003.FJJX, '') FJJX, BP00201.PXJHID SCPXJHID, BP00201.XCPXRQ, BP00201.SJ_KSRQ, BP00201.PXGH, BP00201.KCDD, BP00201.JSXM, BP00201.CQL, BP00201.CJ, BP00201.ZS, BP00201.KHJG, BP002_B.PXJHID PXJHID, BP002_B.JHSJ, b_z_001.rybh, b_z_001.xm FROM B_P_006 JOIN B_P_001 ON B_P_006.GWID = B_P_001.ID AND B_P_001.ZT = 1 AND B_P_006.ZT = 1 AND B_P_006.WXRYDAID = #{wxrydaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} JOIN B_P_005 ON B_P_001.ID = B_P_005.GWID AND B_P_005.ZT = 1 JOIN B_P_003 ON B_P_003.DPRTCODE = B_P_001.DPRTCODE AND B_P_003.ZT = 1 AND COALESCE(B_P_003.FJJX, '-') = COALESCE(B_P_006.FJJX, '-') AND (B_P_003.KCBH = B_P_005.KCID OR B_P_003.ID = B_P_005.KCID) --需要删掉OR后的条件
LEFT JOIN (SELECT B_P_00201.PXJHID, B_P_00201.XCPXRQ, B_P_00201.SJ_KSRQ, B_P_00201.PXGH, B_P_00201.KCDD, B_P_00201.JSXM, B_P_00201.CQL, B_P_00201.CJ, B_P_00201.ZS, B_P_00201.KHJG, B_P_00201.KCID FROM B_P_00201 JOIN B_P_004 ON B_P_00201.ZT = 1 AND B_P_00201.ID = B_P_004.PXJLID AND B_P_004.WXRYDAID = #{wxrydaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) BP00201 ON BP00201.KCID = B_P_003.ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT T1.KCID, T1.WXRYDAID, T1.JHSJ, T1.PXJHID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY B_P_00201.KCID, B_P_00201.WXRYDAID ORDER BY B_P_002.JH_KSRQ DESC, B_P_002.JH_KSSJ DESC) RN, B_P_00201.KCID, B_P_00201.WXRYDAID, B_P_00201.PXJHID, TO_CHAR(B_P_002.JH_KSRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || (CASE WHEN B_P_002.JH_KSSJ IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' || B_P_002.JH_KSSJ END) JHSJ FROM B_P_00201 JOIN B_P_002 ON B_P_00201.ZT = 1 AND B_P_002.ZT = 1 AND B_P_00201.IS_YC = 1 AND B_P_00201.PXJHID = B_P_002.ID) T1 WHERE RN = 1) BP002_B ON B_P_003.ID = BP002_B.KCID AND B_P_006.WXRYDAID = BP002_B.WXRYDAID left join b_z_001 on b_p_006.wxrydaid = b_z_001.id ORDER BY B_P_001.DGBH

SELECT B_P_001.ID BID, B_P_001.DGBH, B_P_001.DGMC, B_P_006.ZT, B_P_006.LB, B_P_006.WXRYDAID, B_P_003.ID KCID, B_P_003.KCBH, B_P_003.KCMC, B_P_003.IS_FX, B_P_003.ZQZ, B_P_003.ZQDW, COALESCE(B_P_003.FJJX, '') FJJX, BP00201.PXJHID SCPXJHID, BP00201.XCPXRQ, BP00201.SJ_KSRQ, BP00201.PXGH, BP00201.KCDD, BP00201.JSXM, BP00201.CQL, BP00201.CJ, BP00201.ZS, BP00201.KHJG, BP002_B.PXJHID PXJHID, BP002_B.JHSJ, b_z_001.rybh, b_z_001.xm FROM B_P_006 JOIN B_P_001 ON B_P_006.GWID = B_P_001.ID AND B_P_001.ZT = 1 AND B_P_006.ZT = 1 JOIN B_P_005 ON B_P_001.ID = B_P_005.GWID AND B_P_005.ZT = 1 JOIN B_P_003 ON B_P_003.DPRTCODE = B_P_001.DPRTCODE AND B_P_003.ZT = 1 AND COALESCE(B_P_003.FJJX, '-') = COALESCE(B_P_006.FJJX, '-') AND (B_P_003.KCBH = B_P_005.KCID OR B_P_003.ID = B_P_005.KCID)
LEFT JOIN (SELECT B_P_00201.PXJHID, B_P_00201.XCPXRQ, B_P_00201.SJ_KSRQ, B_P_00201.PXGH, B_P_00201.KCDD, B_P_00201.JSXM, B_P_00201.CQL, B_P_00201.CJ, B_P_00201.ZS, B_P_00201.KHJG, B_P_00201.KCID, B_P_004.WXRYDAID FROM B_P_00201 JOIN B_P_004 ON B_P_00201.ZT = 1 AND B_P_00201.ID = B_P_004.PXJLID) BP00201 ON BP00201.KCID = B_P_003.ID AND BP00201.WXRYDAID = B_P_006.WXRYDAID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT T1.KCID, T1.WXRYDAID, T1.JHSJ, T1.PXJHID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY B_P_00201.KCID, B_P_00201.WXRYDAID ORDER BY B_P_002.JH_KSRQ DESC, B_P_002.JH_KSSJ DESC) RN, B_P_00201.KCID, B_P_00201.WXRYDAID, B_P_00201.PXJHID, TO_CHAR(B_P_002.JH_KSRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || (CASE WHEN B_P_002.JH_KSSJ IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' || B_P_002.JH_KSSJ END) JHSJ FROM B_P_00201 JOIN B_P_002 ON B_P_00201.ZT = 1 AND B_P_002.ZT = 1 AND B_P_00201.IS_YC = 1 AND B_P_00201.PXJHID = B_P_002.ID) T1 WHERE RN = 1) BP002_B ON B_P_003.ID = BP002_B.KCID AND B_P_006.WXRYDAID = BP002_B.WXRYDAID left join b_z_001 on b_p_006.wxrydaid = b_z_001.id WHERE 1=1 and B_P_001.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ( b_z_001.rybh like '%'||#{paramsMap.ry}||'%' or b_z_001.xm like '%'||#{paramsMap.ry}||'%')
and ( B_P_003.KCBH like '%'||#{paramsMap.kc}||'%' or B_P_003.KCMC like '%'||#{paramsMap.kc}||'%')
and ( B_P_001.DGBH like '%'||#{paramsMap.gw}||'%' or B_P_001.DGMC like '%'||#{paramsMap.gw}||'%')
and ( BP00201.PXGH like '%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%' or BP00201.jsxm like '%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%')
ORDER BY B_P_001.DGBH
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}
mapper.sql: ID, GWID, WXRYDAID, ZT, FJJX, LB WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ
mapper.select:
select t1.ID, t1.GWID, t1.WXRYDAID, t1.ZT, t1.WHBMID, t1.WHRID, t1.WHSJ, t1.FJJX, t1.LB,t2.xm,t2.rybh,(dprt.dprtname) wxrbmid from b_p_006 t1 left join b_z_001 t2 on t1.wxrydaid=t2.id left join t_department dprt on t2.whbmid=dprt.id where 1=1 and t1.GWID in
#{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) from B_P_006 where wxrydaid = #{wxrydaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and gwid = #{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into B_P_006 (ID, GWID, WXRYDAID, ZT, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxrydaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into B_P_006
ID,
GWID,
WXRYDAID,
ZT,
KSRQ,
JZRQ,
WHBMID,
WHRID, WHSJ,
fjjx,
lb,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wxrydaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ksrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{jzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate,
#{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update B_P_006
GWID = #{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WXRYDAID = #{wxrydaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
KSRQ = #{ksrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JZRQ = #{jzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LB = #{lb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_P_006 set GWID = #{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WXRYDAID = #{wxrydaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
